ReviewText: Changed from IPhone to Samsung Products. Apple airpods weren't very compatible so bought these for my Samsung. Great fit, quality and features. Highly recommend.

I had been using a cheap pair of buds that I bought from Amazon and thought they were excellent. For my birthday I decided to updates to the Galaxy Buds to pair with my new Galaxy Phone. I was amazed at how much better they were than my old ones and especially love that the battery lasts a long time and also that the app provides me with so many options for customisation. Excrement happy.
Good sound quality and convenience for using.
item arrived safe in good condition & super fast delivery AAA++++
Too good
I am very happy with the Samsung Galaxy Buds2 Pro. Does everything I need from buds.Price from Amazon was really good and delivered within 24 hours. Can't ask for more then that.
Perfect buds, work really well.
Love them more than Airpods.
Pretty happy with the product! JB Hifi selling $100 more for the same model. Thank you so much.!!!!

After a 3 day delivery hiccup & hiatus, success ... & it was worth the wait. Negotiated my way through set up via online & the big test was Gregory Porter singing Sting's "It's Probably Me" @ Polar Music Prize Ceremony 2017. Superb.Yet to test drive Lohengrin Prelude.Special thanks to Associate Carl for his exemplary service & follow up.
i can talk in the truck no worries and people can omg actually hear me
The bud pros are a great fit and sound quality is really good..Great for workouts too
Delivery was very fast, product was new and in box sealed.
Samsung Galaxy Buds2 Pro, Graphite have proven much better than my expectations! Been using them daily to listen to audio books in pub loud cafes, very effective.
Excellent product

Love the colour, features, how they feel. Just nothing bad about them.

As described. Perfect to use and comfy to wear. Better than expected with clear sound and noise counselling.
The delivery time and all the product is ok

Amazing sound quality, very convenient and robust touch features, and impressive noise cancelling and ambient sound modes.I had been concerned about purchasing this item based on a number of negative reviews related to the noise cancelling and sound quality, but I now understand that such reviews are most likely from ocd types with a superficial grasp on the topics of signal processing and electronic hardware.If you want absolute isolation to outside noise interference, opt for industrial grade ear plugs; noise cancellation is not a magic panacea.Moreover, for the physical size and price of these earbuds, the sound quality is quite impressive. You'd likely require in excess of several thousands of dollars for custom headphones if you're looking for studio quality sound.
Best buds so far, great fit, easy to use, definitely recommend
Perfect with my new Galaxy phone
Love these over everything else eay to use
I bought for the first time, got seller and product. Cool sound and love it!!!

If you're on the fence between these and Airpods, Bose QC, Sony xm4s, this beats them all in terms of sound quality. Incredible value for money especially on sale for $209. The only thing I would point out is that they can struggle to stay in your ear if you have weirdly shaped ear canals like me. I solved this by putting O rings on nozzle below the silicone tips.
Love these. Very clean and clear sound. Connecting is easy.
first try samsung earbuds. and this good üëç

So I'm a music fan, and I've tried many different headphones and buds over the years.  My last pair were the Jabra Elite 7, which is fantastic, I've since lost them, and the lack of a find me feature is a pain.  So I bought the Samsung Buds.  Ok,  sound quality 9/10, ANC 8/10, ambient mode 10/10, build quality 10/10The ambient mode is impressive; I can hear better with the buds in, especially if you turn on the boost mode.All in all, they're pretty good.
Loads of features, sound quality is great. Really good for jogging
Fantastic design and great tech. I'm really happy with these! The fit and sound quality are excellent and the Samsung Wear app works really well.

Love the colour. Nice and compact. Comfortable to wear. Audio is very clear. Great to be able to talk on the phone hands free. Would not go back to earphones with a lead that plugs in. Really happy with these ear buds, they connect seamlessly with my Samsung phone.

Absolutely love these eat buds.So much so that I bought my wife a pair and she also loves them.I personally use them mostly for extended phone calls mostly (one was a 5 hour business call) but when I have used them for music while walking, the volume and bass is great.They're comfortable to wear for extended periods and easy to forget that they're in when you have the ambient setting on.My wife uses them for Netflix and YouTube while she's cooking or doing stuff around the house.Highly recommend
This is my first wireless earbud and I'm impressed. I've always just used a wired one and now can never go back to one.These are very comfortable and has good sound for listening to music.
